question: I want to build a website/mobile app, can you help?
answer:
Sure thing! I’m available as an individual UI designer and developer for small-scale projects. I can help you revamp your current interface (improve usability, optimize for mobile screens, integrate your social media platforms and other third-party tools and services, etc.), or build your website or app from scratch, i.e.:

  • • Complete user research,
  • • Run content audit,
  • • Create wireframes / navigation flowcharts, and make UI mockups based on your desired colour and typography schemes, as well as accepted usability principles,
  • • Depending on the type of app, your timeline and resources, I can also make a high-fidelity interactive prototype using tools like Figma and Adobe XD and test it with potential users,
  • • And finally, build your application using my portfolio technologies!

Get in touch now to discuss your app requirements in more detail!

question: I'm looking to hire a developer, are you a good fit?
answer:
I have a solid working knowledge of Javascript and its React.js library, a keen interest in usability and interaction design, and a great appetite for improving my skills and advancing further in my career.

I’m comfortable picking up new technologies and know how to find answers quickly. My experience includes working in a cross-functional team on an array of projects of various sizes using iterative software development practices. As a bit of a neat freak, I’m exceptionally suited for tasks that require pixel-perfect precision and aesthetic judgement, meticulous care for end-user experience, and clean organised code. I will thrive in a team of developers who are just a tad more experienced than me and have the bandwidth to share their knowledge.

Sounds fair? Get in touch, let’s discuss ways I can create value for your company today!

question: What tools and technologies do you use?
answer:
Here’s a list of tools and technologies that power my applications:

  • • React
  • • React Native
  • • Vanilla Javascript
  • • Interfacing with REST API using AXIOS / Fetch API
  • • JSON / XML
  • • WordPress (CMS + headless CMS)
  • • Material UI / Bootstrap
  • • Figma
  • • Adobe XD
  • • CSS/SASS/Less
  • • HTML5
  • • Git version control
  • • Agile software development

I feel particularly competent about:

  • • Developing modular scalable single page applications in React;
  • • Creating responsive layouts with plain CSS and all popular CSS preprocessors and libraries;
  • • Formulating calls to various REST APIs;
  • • Working collaboratively on a project through an established git workflow;
  • • User interface design heuristics;

question: How experienced are you?
answer:
I have 1+ years of hands-on industry experience building responsive user interfaces for web and mobile apps with Vanilla Javascript and React.js.

Working as a Lead Developer in my previous role I:

  • • Administered the company's legacy website;
  • • Worked on an array of projects creating landing pages for various events based on received designs and functionality specs;
  • • Contributed extensively to the new website project from the early stage up until the beta phase through planning and analysing user requirements, creating application architecture and design system, writing software, debugging and deployment;
  • • Successfully managed a cross-functional team using agile methodology to deliver targets as planned, maintaining everyone's interest and commitment and clearly communicating expectations and deadlines for deliverables;
  • • Worked closely with designers and copywriters to develop an interface that answered the company’s strategy and business rules, as well as accepted usability principles;
  • • Managed the codebase / initiated peer code reviews to identify bugs and technical debt, and pushed for better standards offering recommendations for improving the source code readability and maintainability.

See my github

Get in touch, let’s discuss ways I can create value for your company today!

question: Do we share the same culture?
answer:
I believe in the power of diversity, honest communication, trust, transparency and short feedback cycle. I like to take ownership of my work and have a personal impact on products I’m developing.

I’m attracted to organizations with a strong learning culture and work ethics, that offer a career destination and an opportunity to make a meaningful difference in the lives of their clients.

question: What is your Superpower?
answer:
I’m a neat freak. I have a passion for highly polished things and like to do everything well. In developer terms, that means consistent design, no unintentional asymmetry, spaghetti code, or technical debt.

"Detail-oriented" is not just another word I put on my resume - it’s my brand. I like to complete my work conscientiously - with a touch of awe(some).

question: I want to learn to code. Where do I start?
answer:
I’m glad you asked! There’s plenty of free (or inexpensive) resources out there to choose from. Whether you are looking to switch careers or add to your existing skillset, I’ll be happy to share my learning path with you, and give practical advice to help you launch your coding journey.

Get in touch via email or LinkedIn and let’s talk!
